mapper.select: SELECT SRTNCD, ISINCD, MRKTCTG, ITMSNM, CRNO, CORPNM, BASDT FROM STOCK_INFO

SELECT SI.SRTNCD, SI.ISINCD, SI.MRKTCTG, SI.ITMSNM, SI.CRNO, SI.CORPNM, SI.BASDT, CASE WHEN UFS.FAVORITE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS IS_FAVORITE FROM STOCK_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_FAVORITE_STOCKS UFS ON SI.SRTNCD = UFS.FAVORITE_ID ORDER BY SI.ITMSNM LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT SI.SRTNCD, SI.ISINCD, SI.MRKTCTG, SI.ITMSNM, SI.CRNO, SI.CORPNM, SI.BASDT, SP.CLPR, SP.VS, SP.FLTRT, SP.MKP, SP.HIPR, SP.LOPR, SP.TRQU, SP.TRPRC, SP.LSTGSTCNT, SP.MRKTTOTAMT FROM STOCK_INFO SI INNER JOIN USER_FAVORITE_STOCKS UFS ON SI.SRTNCD = UFS.FAVORITE_ID INNER JOIN STOCK_PRICE SP ON SI.ISINCD = SP.ISINCD WHERE UFS.USER_ID=#{userId} AND SP.BASDT = (SELECT MAX(BASDT) FROM STOCK_PRICE)
SELECT SRTNCD, ISINCD, MRKTCTG, ITMSNM, CRNO, CORPNM, BASDT FROM STOCK_INFO WHERE SRTNCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stockCode}, '%') OR ITMSNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stockCode}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STOCK_INFO WHERE SRTNCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ITMSNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT SI.SRTNCD, SI.ISINCD, SI.MRKTCTG, SI.ITMSNM, SI.CRNO, SI.CORPNM, SI.BASDT, CASE WHEN UFS.FAVORITE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS IS_FAVORITE FROM STOCK_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_FAVORITE_STOCKS UFS ON SI.SRTNCD = UFS.FAVORITE_ID WHERE SI.SRTNCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR SI.ITMSNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY SI.ITMSNM LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT SI.SRTNCD, SI.ISINCD, SI.MRKTCTG, SI.ITMSNM, SI.CRNO, SI.CORPNM, DATE_FORMAT(SP.BASDT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BASDT, SP.CLPR, SP.VS, SP.FLTRT, SP.MKP, SP.HIPR, SP.LOPR, SP.TRQU, SP.TRPRC, SP.LSTGSTCNT, SP.MRKTTOTAMT FROM STOCK_INFO SI INNER JOIN STOCK_PRICE SP ON SI.ISINCD = SP.ISINCD WHERE (SI.SRTNCD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR SI.ITMSNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND SP.BASDT = #{basedt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_FAVORITE_STOCKS ( FAVORITE_ID, USER_ID, ADD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{srtnCd}, #{userId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'))
